def can_ignore_one_switch(n, m, grid):
    counts = [sum((grid[i][j] == '1' for i in range(n))) for j in range(m)]
    no_skip = all((any((grid[i][j] == '1' and counts[j] == 1 for j in range(m))) for i in range(n)))
    return '' if no_skip else 'YES'
